actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to establish a select committee of the House of Representatives to investigate actions necessary to locate Americans reported missing in action while serving as members of the Armed Forces in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam conflict.

summary.text: Establishes a select committee of the House of Representatives to investigate actions necessary to locate Americans reported missing in action while serving as members of the Armed Forces in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam conflict.

titles.title: Resolution to establish a select committee of the House of Representatives to investigate actions necessary to locate Americans reported missing in action while serving as members of the Armed Forces in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam conflict.
